text: hi i'm alex schrameyer a specialist
solutions architect for amazon connect
in this video i'd like to tell you about
contact lens for amazon connect and show
you how it helps improve your contact
center agent's productivity customer
experience and manager insights
contact lens for amazon connect is a set
of machine learning capabilities that
enables businesses to analyze customer
conversations directly within amazon
connect our omnichannel cloud-based
contact center
contact lens helps you follow the
sentiment and trends of customer
conversations in real time to identify
crucial company and product feedback
uncover poor experiences and alert
supervisors to coaching opportunities
during live calls
this helps agents focus their attention
on the customer conversation saving
valuable time they would otherwise spend
taking notes and instead recording and
transcribing the key parts of customer
interactions
it helps supervisors conduct fast full
text search on all transcripts to
quickly troubleshoot customer issues
and it helps managers
view call summaries alongside the call
recording and contact details in amazon
connect to quickly understand the
context of an interaction
help with follow-up items such as
issuing refunds and provide precise
feedback to agents
contact lens superchargers quality
analysts
tracking the compliance of customer
conversations in your contact center
helping train agents and replicating
successful interactions
rather than listening to a percentage of
the conversations contact lens monitors
all conversations and services the best
of the best by categorizing them based
on conversation characteristics this
includes attributes such as sentiment
non-talk time and interruptions to
efficiently identify reproducible
behaviors or coaching opportunities
these capabilities are available as a
part of an out of the box integrated
experience in amazon connect to prove
that let me show you just how easy it is
to enable in your contact center contact
lens for amazon connect is enabled
directly in the aws console like any
other aws service
just navigate to the analytics tools
section of your amazon connect instance
click enable
and then save that's it
customizing its settings and enabling
contact lens at a contact flow level is
just as easy let me show you how
to do so navigate to your contact flows
simply place the set recording and
analytics behavior block onto the canvas
and click it to open its settings
you start by enabling call recording for
the agent and the customer
once recording is turned on select
enable contact lens
here you have the option of selecting
post call analytics which provides the
best transcription accuracy and provides
the results at the end of a call or real
time and post call analytics which
enables real-time alerts and actions in
addition to the post call capabilities
if you choose the real-time option
you can set up alerts based on keywords
and phrases that the customer may utter
during the call
additionally contact lens has the
ability to redact sensitive data from
the recordings and transcripts
by selecting this option sensitive data
such as names addresses and credit card
information can be removed automatically
from the recording and the transcript
using natural language understanding
once contact lens is enabled in the
contact flow future calls will be
recorded transcribed and analyzed by
configured rules let's take a look at
what you now have in your contact
details analytics dashboard
this is the contact details page where
data and analytics from your call
recordings will populate
the section at the top displays a
summary of speech analytics
here you can see the customer sentiment
trends
the categories section lists the
categories that have been set up
when you tap or click on the category
tags contact lens auto-navigates to the
corresponding point of interest in the
transcript
there are also category markers in the
recording playback visualization to
indicate which part of the audio file
has utterances related to the category
you can set up contact lens to track
issues that you know exist in your
contact center or no knowns
and monitor any changes over time
you can label your contacts with
pre-defined criteria that you set up
that is keywords and phrases that you
want to detect
through categorization each contact is
analyzed for these criteria and then
labeled
[Music]
this is useful for example when ensuring
that agents are speaking certain words
or phrases for compliance reasons or for
example you want to investigate when
customers use certain words and have a
negative sentiment it can be time
consuming to review contact transcripts
that are hundreds of lines long
to make this process faster and more
efficient contact lens provides the
option for you to view a transcript
summary
the summary shows only those lines where
contact lens has identified an issue
outcome or action item in the transcript
the recording section provides controls
you can use to listen to an audio
recording of the contact
with auto scroll when you listen to a
conversation the transcript moves along
with it showing you sentiment emojis and
any detected issue
because the audio and transcript are
aligned the transcript can help you
understand what the agent and customer
are saying
this is especially useful when the audio
is bad maybe due to a connection issue
the transcript can help you understand
what's being said or there's a dialect
or language variant our models are
trained
on different accents so the transcript
can help you understand what's being
said
contact lens for amazon connect also
opens up additional capabilities
for example contact lens works directly
with amazon connect wisdom a feature for
amazon connect to deliver agents the
information they need reducing the time
spent searching for answers
wisdom uses real-time call analysis from
contact lens for amazon connect to
automatically detect customer issues
during calls and to recommend relevant
content stored across connected
knowledge repositories saving agent time
manually searching and reviewing
potential solutions or articles
we hope you've enjoyed this
demonstration of contact lens for amazon
connects capabilities for more
information check out our website at
aws.com
connect
